en.description_radio_disabled: Radio can be disabled by config property disabled.
en.description_radio_itemWidth: Item width could be by property itemWidth which configured in number, unit is px.
en.radio_description: Used to select a single state in multiple options. The difference between Select is that Radio is visible to user and can facilitate the comparison of choice, which makes there shouldn't be too many of them

zh-CN.description_radio_disabled: 通过设置disabled属性，Radio 可以被禁止选择。
zh-CN.description_radio_itemWidth: Item 的宽度可以用数字属性 itemWidth 来设置，单位是 px 。
zh-CN.radio_description: 用于在多个备选项中选中单个状态。和 Select 的区别是，Radio 所有选项默认可见，方便用户在比较中选择，因此选项不宜过多。
